subject: Re: VAM Pro Question
description_text:
Hi Cam Kinsman,  It is compatible with Fanatec’s pedal control box, as they use the same connector.          
                           
                            On
                            Tue, 3 Jun at  7:40 PM
                            ,  Cam Kinsman <camjkinsman@gmail.com>  wrote:
                             Hi, 
   
 I’d like to order the VAM Pro haptics, but I want to confirm compatibility. Aside from requiring my own mounting solution, will the haptic system work with my fanatec pedals/wheelbase? 
   
 Would I just use the Simsonn control box for the haptic motors? Any help/confirmation would be great, and I will place my order once I’m confident they will work for me. 
   
 Thank you! 
   
 Cam
